K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-0: 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa @440b tshe; ;sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-1: 'od zer sna lngas kun tu khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-2: kun nas yongs su zlum po ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-4: mchod pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa; ;mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-5: gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-6: rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-12: mi bskyod pa yi rgya mchog dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-17: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-19: rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-22: thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-30: rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-31: kun tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:440b-32: phyag na rin chen bsnams par sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:441a-3: 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:441a-5: gdon mi za ba rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:441a-6: zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:441a-7: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445a-15: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445a-17: thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445a-20: thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445a-22: sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445a-23: ngag dang yid kyis bskul nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445a-24: yid ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445a-25: dngos grub rab mchog bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-0: sems la dmigs pa bdag @445b med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-1: ngag dang lus kyang rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-2: nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-3: sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-4: lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-5: ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-6: sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-7: byang chub med cing bsgom pa'ang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-8: sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-9: 'di ni mdor na rnam dpyad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-10: sngags kyis brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-11: byang chub sbyor ba bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-12: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-14: sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-15: sgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-16: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-17: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-18: sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-19: phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-20: sna yi rtse mor yungs kar bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-22: ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-23: gsang ba'i ye shes kyis brtag sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-24: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-25: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-26: sangs rgyas sku yi gnas bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-27: de yi steng du gnas bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-28: h'um; nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-29: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-30: spyan gyi ctshul du sbyor ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-31: rdo rje padma rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:445b-32: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-2: mchog gi sbyor ba nan tan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-3: de yi steng du yongs su bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-4: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-6: sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-7: 'khor yang khyad par dag tu spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-9: rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-10: nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-11: sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-12: tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-13: 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-14: sna yi rtse mor 'di shes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-15: bsgoms pas byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-16: 'khor lo la sogs khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-17: bsgom pa der ni brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-18: dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-20: sangs rgyas byang chub gnas rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-21: de ru mdor na spro bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-22: sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-23: chos kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-24: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-25: de nyid don kun ston pa pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-26: spyod pa kun mchog legs dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-27: gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-28: gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-29: shes rab can gyis zla drug sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-30: gsang ba'i de nyid mchod chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-31: legs par mchod nas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446a-33: zas su bshang gci zos na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-0: sangs rgyas byang chub skyon @446b med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-1: yang dag bla med grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-2: zas su sha rnams za ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-3: sha chen dag ni rab brtags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-4: sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-6: glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-7: de bzhin dam pa khyi yi sha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-8: zas kyi phyir ni bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-9: zas gzhan dag ni ma zos na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-10: byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-11: sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-12: 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-13: myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-16: gtso bo gzi can stobs dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-17: mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-18: mthong ba tsam gyis bskul med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-20: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-21: gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-22: yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-26: thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-29: thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:446b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-0: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i @447a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-2: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-3: ji ltar 'dod par bsten na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-4: 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-5: sangs rgyas myur du thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-6: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-7: ji ltar 'dod par bsten bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-8: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-9: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-10: dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas; ;bsten kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-11: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-13: slong mo za zhing mi bzla ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-14: slong mo'ang dga' bar mi bya'o; ;'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-15: sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-16: lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-17: bde bar gnas na byang chub 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-18: gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-19: dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-20: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-21: sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-22: chos mchog mi g-yo brnyes pa yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-23: 'dod pa thams cad bsten pas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-24: chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-25: rtag tu 'dod yon lnga rnams bsten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-26: byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-27: byang chub nyi ma chags par bya; ;gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-28: mchod par byed pas mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-29: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447a-30: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-0: sgra la rnam @447b gsum shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-1: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-2: de nyid bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-3: sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-4: dri la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-5: sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-6: de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-8: ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-9: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya; ;de nyid sangs rgyas sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-10: sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-11: reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-12: bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-13: de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-14: mi bskyod pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-15: gzugs sgra dri la sogs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-16: rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-17: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-18: gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-19: gzugs sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-20: lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-21: yang na de la sgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-22: rigs kyi tshul du rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-23: sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-24: chos ni rjes su dran sgom pa; ;rdo rje rjes su dran sgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-25: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-26: rigs ni rjes su dran par sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-27: khro bo rjes su dran sgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-28: lha ni rjes su dran par sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-29: bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-30: bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-31: lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-32: byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:447b-33: dben bar mchod pa rab tu brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448a-0: @448a *// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-2: ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-9: de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-24: de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-25: gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-26: kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-27: rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-28: bdag gi sems kyang de 'drar gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-29: de la sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-30: sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-31: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-32: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:448b-33: mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-4: thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-5: sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-6: gsung gi sku yang rnam sgom pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-7: bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-8: sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-9: de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-10: dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-11: 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-13: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-14: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-15: thams cad ma skyes zag pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-16: byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-17: khams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-18: de la ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-19: thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-20: mtshan med mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-21: gnyis med gnyis su med min bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-22: shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-23: de la zhe sdang gi rigs la sogs pa'i mchod pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-24: bud med sems ni rab brtan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-25: lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed pa; ;rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-26: bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-27: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449a-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-0: chos 'dzin mchog gi @449b gsung dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-2: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-3: gang gzhan phra mor bshad pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-4: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-8: thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-9: sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-12: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-14: nam mkha'i spyod pa rnam sbyong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-15: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-16: rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-17: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-18: rdo rje theg pa rab ston pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-19: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-20: rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-21: thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-22: theg pa gsum gyi lam la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-23: sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-24: mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-25: byang chub sems na rgyas pa'i spyan [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-26: chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-27: sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-28: phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-29: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:449b-30: thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-1: cad dbang bskur kun gyi don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-2: kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-4: rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-5: sku dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-7: na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-8: gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-9: lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-10: byol song las kyang rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-11: sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-12: rgyal nyid skyes zhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-13: bshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-14: rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag par rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-15: nu ma'i dbus bar spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-16: cho ga shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-17: lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-18: rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-19: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-20: ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-21: bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-22: mkhas pas snying gar bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-24: bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-25: rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-26: 'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-27: ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-28: gnas de yin par rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-29: bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-30: mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-31: mkhas pas autpa la dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450a-32: padma rnam pa lngar shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-0: @450b dz'a ti rnam gsum shes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-1: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-2: me tog karnni k'a ra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-3: ma lli k'a dang yu thi k'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-4: me tog ka ra b'i ra bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-5: mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-6: dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-8: rnam par mkhas pas rtag par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-9: rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-10: de bzhin padma rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-11: ral gri autpal mkhas pas bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-12: dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-13: gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-14: mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-15: gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-16: rigs rnams thams cad mchod pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-17: shes rab can gyis gnas su bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-18: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-19: de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-20: rin chen na bza' la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-21: byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-22: mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-23: rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-24: rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-25: rin chen sna tshogs mchog gis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-26: sgrub tshe rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-27: sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-28: zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-29: mkhas pa dag gis yongs bkang la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-30: dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-31: nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-32: bdag po'i phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-33: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:450b-34: 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-0: @451a *// reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-1: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-2: dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-4: bla ma bshad dang gcig bas mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-5: bzhin bzang shin tu mdzes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-6: na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-7: byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-8: sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-9: mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-10: khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-11: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-12: sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-13: ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-14: sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-17: thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-18: bshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-19: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-20: thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-21: thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-22: dbang phyug dam pa kun don gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-23: sku gsung thugs la longs sbyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-24: rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-25: sangs rgyas ye shes can gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-26: nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-27: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-28: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-29: rdo rje mi bskyod rab bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451a-30: lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-0: @451b 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-1: dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-2: bsgoms nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-3: sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-4: rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa; ;bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-5: thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-6: rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-7: sems can thams cad bsad na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-8: mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu [?]/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-9: rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-10: 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-11: rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho yin par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-12: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-13: mi shes thar pa rab sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-14: ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-15: byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-16: sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-17: yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-18: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-20: rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-21: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-22: rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-23: rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-24: nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-25: rdo rje gsum du rnam bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-26: nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-28: sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-29: thub pa'i skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:451b-30: 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-0: gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa @452a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-2: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-3: 'dod chags thar pa rab bsgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-4: gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-5: dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-6: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-8: dpag med tshe ni rab bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-9: sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-10: bud med lta bur sbyar ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-11: dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-12: thams cad de ru bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-13: 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-14: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-15: de dang mas cad nye bar spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-16: 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-17: mi phyed sku gsum sgom pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-18: 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-19: sngags pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-20: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-21: rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-22: bdag med ye shes las byung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-23: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-24: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-25: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-26: rdo rje thogs med rab bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-28: thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-29: rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-30: rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-31: rgyal ba thams cad bslu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-32: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452a-33: nam mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-0: ye shes blo can @452b kun gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-1: sngags kyi dngos grub thob par bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-2: 'di ni dam tshig 'gugs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-3: don ji lta bu bzhin du spro bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-4: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-5: rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-6: rdo rje dngos grub rab ston pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-7: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-8: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-9: dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-10: dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-11: gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-12: rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-13: bsten na ye shes thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-15: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-16: ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-17: rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-21: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-22: 'di lta bu'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gi lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:452b-23: rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i skad du gsung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs @453a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-2: brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo snyad kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-6: smad pa'i 'du shes de lta bu 'ang ma skyed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-10: sngags kyi spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-12: sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-16: nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-17: chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-18: chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-19: gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-20: gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-21: 'byung ba chen po bzhi la 'ang mi gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-23: chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-25: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453a-27: de ltar nam mkha' tshig nges par brjod pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su @453b rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-5: mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba 'byung zhing me 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-6: me de 'ang gtsub shing la 'ang mi gnas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-8: mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la'ang mi gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-10: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-11: 'ong pa la sogs pa rjes su rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-15: rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-16: nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-17: rnam par mi rtog dag pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-18: kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-21: thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-22: don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-24: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-26: thugs kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag btsal ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-28: de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:453b-29: sku dang gsung thugs gsang bar bsgrags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-2: yang dag bcom ldan bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-3: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-4: nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-5: 'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-6: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-7: lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-8: rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-9: gang na'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-10: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer sgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la rol pa ston par mdzad de; phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rol cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-15: dgyes par yongs su spyod pa yod kyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454a-16: de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-0: 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos rdzogs par gyur to snyam nas spyan ras kyis @454b mi 'tsho ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-1: de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag la spyan ras kyis btsa' ba'i phyir /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-5: sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun du bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-8: thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-14: thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa 'di /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-17: thugs rdo rje las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di lta bu gsungs so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-21: rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-23: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungs so; ;nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-28: rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-29: sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:454b-30: drangs par de yis rnam bsgoms na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-3: kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-4: rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-5: bskyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-6: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-7: snying po rdo rje bsdus pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-8: rang sngags skyes bur bsgoms na ni //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-10: zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-16: yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-17: de yi dbus su bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-18: rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-21: rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-22: de yis snying gar brdab byas te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455a-27: rdo rje kyo ba rnam bsgom zhing //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455b-7: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455b-8: rdo rje gsum gyi ston pa mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455b-10: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455b-19: chags la chags pas blta bar bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455b-24: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455b-28: de dag thams cad nye par spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455b-29: bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:455b-34: byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:456a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:456a-4: thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:456a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:456a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das sku dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-9: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-11: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-13: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-17: badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-18: k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-19: de nas 'di ni gsungs ma thag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-20: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-21: brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-22: nam mkha' rdo rje thugs dran 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-23: mi rus las byas phur bu 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-24: yang na seng ldeng rtse las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-25: lcags las byas pa'i phur bu dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-26: rdo rje sku gsum 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-28: rdo rje sems dpar mnyam gzhag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-29: rdo rje sku ni gsum gyi mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-30: gzugs brnyan bsams nas sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-31: rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-32: yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-33: gshin rje gshed kyi rgya chen dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-34: bsams na rdo rje gsum yang gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-35: rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-36: bgos nas lingga rkang pas mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-37: khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-38: brgya rtsa brgyad ni yongs bzlas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-39: sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-41: chu yis gos ni gsher bar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483b-42: khro bo mchog gi bcings pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483a-27: yang na thod pa gang ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483a-28: khyad par du ni mkhas pas btsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483a-29: der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483a-30: rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483a-31: dgra yi sgo 'am grong dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483a-32: sbas na nges par skrod par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483a-33: ta la'i lo ma'am gzhan la'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483a-34: khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:483a-35: dgra yi grong ngam sgo dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-2: sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-3: rdo rje'i sbyor bas bya ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-4: snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i mthar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-5: rdo rje phur bu rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-6: gong du'ang dam tshig de nyid bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-8: bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-9: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-11: phur bus btab na myur du 'chi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-13: sku'i dam tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-16: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-21: phan tshun dkri ba'i tshul du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-22: mthe bong bzhi ni rab tu bsdam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-23: rnam par snang mdzad tshul gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-24: rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-25: btab ma thag tu sems dpa' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-26: rdo rje sku gsum las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-27: dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung rnam par 'phrul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-0: gsung gi dam tshig tsham ngam gnod @484b pa rdo rje'i sngags 'di /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-3: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-5: ye shes padmo kha bye ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-6: rdo rje sor mo nges par bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-7: 'dod chags rdo rje'i tshul gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-8: rdo rje'i phur bus nges par 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-9: btab ma thag tu rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-10: sku gsum dri med las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-11: btab pa tsam gyis ldang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-14: thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-15: thugs kyi dam tshig tsham dam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'di /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-18: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-20: rtse mo lnga par bcings nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-22: rdo rje thugs kyi tshul gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-23: rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-24: btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-25: rdo rje dri med gsum las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-26: btab ma thag tu ldang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-28: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-29: cho ga legs par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-30: mkha' dbyings rdo rje mthas klas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-31: phur bus 'debs par gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-32: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-33: de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:484b-34: sems can khams la phan mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-0: @485a *// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-1: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-2: ae ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-3: ae ma'o snying po kun bsdus pa; ;ae ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-4: ae ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-5: phur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-6: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-7: sku gsum thugs kyi rdo rje rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-8: phur bus gdab pa yang dag bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-9: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-10: phur gdab de nyid las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-11: sku gsung thugs ni mchog sbyin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-12: sngags kyi de nyid don bsdus pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-15: thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-18: thugs rmad du byung ba'i sngags kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-19: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-20: thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-21: thams cad dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-22: rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-23: smre sha can gyi bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-24: bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-25: dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-26: sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-27: bshang gci dam tshig la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485a-28: de ru cho ga bzhin du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-0: dkyil 'khor @485b gru bzhi lham par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-1: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-2: mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-3: rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-4: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa; ;pang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-6: sangs rgyas rnams su rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-7: sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-8: mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-9: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-10: rnam par snang mdzad sku chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-11: bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-14: btso blag mkhan ni bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-15: bu mo autpal mthing ga'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-17: sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-18: byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-19: 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-20: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-21: de ni de ma thag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-23: rgyal po chos rnams kun dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-25: rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-26: gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-27: bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-28: sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-29: de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-30: sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-31: rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:485b-32: mnga' bdag dam pa kun gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-2: dmangs rigs las byung bu mo ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-3: rdo rje chos bdag bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-4: 'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-5: rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-6: sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-7: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus su ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-9: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-10: spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-11: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-13: 'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-14: sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-15: dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-16: de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-17: dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-18: sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par bya; ;'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-19: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-20: rdo rje can gyi grub 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-21: bshang gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-22: 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-23: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-24: bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-25: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-26: sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-27: de nyid bla na med pa 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486a-29: thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo @486b zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun tu skrag par byed pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-2: nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-3: aom hr'i: shti wi kri t'a na na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-4: sarba sha tr'un n'a sha ya stam bha ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-5: dug ni khrag dang kun tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-6: lan tsha ske tshe yungs mar te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-7: khro zhing tsher ma'i me la sreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-8: bu mo'i ming dang tshig tu bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-9: nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-10: 'di ni yong ye rab tu shis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-11: shes rab can gyi gru gsum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-12: stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul bzhin bsreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-13: bu mo dag gi don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-14: 'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-15: bskal pa grangs med gsum du yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-16: de yis rtag tu gnon par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-17: sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-18: yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-19: gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-20: de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-21: bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-22: dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-23: cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-24: de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-25: sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-26: dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-27: bsam gtan dag gis bris na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-29: tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-30: phab na nges par ltung bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:486b-31: h'um ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-2: phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-3: gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-4: rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-5: skyes pa'am bud med gzugs bris la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-6: lag par sta re bsams nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-7: mid pa bcad par rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-8: sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-9: sems can kun la phan 'dod pa; ;'di yang snad par 'gyur ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-10: shi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-11: las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-12: me stag mang po 'khrigs pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-13: dbus su rdo rje bsams na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-14: chu rnams mnan pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-16: rlung la sogs pa byung na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:487a-17: mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-0: @489a *// gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-3: rig pa'i rgyal mo chos mchog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-4: dkon mchog dpal ni rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-5: rig pa'i rgyal mo sbyor ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-6: che dpag med pa rab tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-7: thams cad las byed sngags rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-8: gdon mi za ba'i ye shes bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-9: sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-12: gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-13: gshin rje gshed ni brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-14: sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-15: spyi bo nas ni bskul ba shis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-17: bsam gtan 'khor lo de yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:489a-18: sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:490b-22: na ma: sa manta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzr'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:490b-30: bi sphot ya bi spho ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:490b-31: sarba bighan bi n'a ya k'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:490b-32: mah'a ga na pa ti dz'i b'i t'anta k'a r'a ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:490b-33: sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:490b-34: lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:490b-35: ma yengs pa yi sems kyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:490b-36: 'di ni gsod pa'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-3: sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-4: bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-5: de la 'di ni drag po chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-6: mkha' dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-7: yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-8: gdug pa de yis bsad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-9: bsams na de ma thag tu 'chi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-10: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-11: yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-12: gdug pa'i sems pas bsad na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-14: sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-15: skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-16: sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-18: srin po khro bo sna tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-19: gtum zhing khro ba mi bzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-20: der ni skrag par byas bsams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-22: 'ug pa khva dang bya rgod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-23: mchu ring ba dang wa rnams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-24: de yis zos par bsams na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-25: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-26: sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-28: dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-29: dpral bar bsams na khyad 'phags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-30: sprul de zos par bsams na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-31: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491a-32: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-0: yams sam gnod @491b par byed pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-2: 'di ni bskul ba'i mchog yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-3: thob rab tu drag po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-4: brtul zhugs can gyis snying gar brdeg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-6: dgra bo'i srog ni med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-7: rdo rje sta re la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-8: gsheg cing gtub par bsams na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-9: sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-11: srung ba la sogs sngags rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-12: lha rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-13: 'di ni gsod par byed pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-14: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o; ;rdo rje'i phung pos ji tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-15: sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-16: gsang bdag nyid gtogs bsams na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-17: mnyes par 'gyur te gzhan du min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-18: ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-19: rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-20: rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-22: bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig khro bos de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-23: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-24: thams cad nam mkha' thub chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-25: thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-26: ye shes rdo rjes bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-28: ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-29: rdo rje theg pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-30: ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-31: rgyal ba rnams kyis skye bar bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:491b-32: de la 'di ni las phran tshegs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-3: lce gnyis mche ba'i phreng can ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-4: rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-5: de la 'di ni klu khro bo bskul ba'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-6: kham; mi bzad par ni 'gyur ba'i dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-7: rdo rje'i dbus na 'dug par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-8: dug ni ha la ha la mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-9: sreg pa'i me yi kha dog bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-10: bsgoms na 'gul bar gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-11: de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'byin pa'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-13: hr'i:/ rnam pa sna tshogs las byung dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-14: khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-17: 'bab par gyur par rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-18: de ni de ma thag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-19: mi bzad dug gi rgya mtshor 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-20: reg ma thag tu skye bo kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-22: sdig pa rus sbal la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-23: sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-24: sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-25: cho ga bzhin du rab tu bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-26: de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'pho ba'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-27: aom; lta ba rdo rje'i dug la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-28: gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-29: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-30: bsams na ye shes rdo rjes 'dren //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-31: bcom ldan 'das dug gi dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-32: de la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492a-33: h'um; rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-0: kha dog dkar por @492b rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-2: zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-3: gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-5: lan gsum legs par bsgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-6: skyugs pa dag tu rnam bsams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-7: nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-8: de ma thag tu dug med 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-9: zhes de skad bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-10: de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-12: a'a:/ 'bras dang phol mig 'brum bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-13: gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-14: phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-15: bsam pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-17: zla ba bzhin du dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-18: de yi dbus na 'dug bsam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-20: sdud pa na ni dam tshig gnag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-21: bskul ba na ni dkar po 'dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-22: bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-23: ye shes dri med gsang chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-24: de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nad rnams gso ba'i rdo rje snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-28: nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-29: yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-30: dad pas yon tan thob 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-31: de 'dra'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-33: yang na khyi las byung ba'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-34: rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:492b-35: byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-2: bsgoms na rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-3: lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-4: des ni phye mar brlag par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-5: de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-6: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-7: byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-8: dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-9: 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to; ;rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-10: sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-11: rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-12: nad las thar par rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-13: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-14: blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-15: de la khros par bsams na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-16: 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-17: bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-18: las skyes su yang gang grags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-19: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-21: yang na bdag gis sngags rgyal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-22: rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-23: 'di ni nad rnams thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-24: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-25: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-26: ye shes kyo ba 'od po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-27: 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje ches //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-28: gsum ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-29: chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-30: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-31: rang bzhin dag pa de nyid la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493a-32: 'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-0: bsam gtan bzlas pa don brtson @493b pa'i; ;sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-1: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-2: dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-3: de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te; byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-4: sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-5: sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-6: skur yang bdag nyid myur du mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-7: sems can chen po khams gsum pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-8: mchod pa byed par des mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-10: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-11: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-12: rtag tu mchod pa byed par mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-14: grags pa chen po rdo rje chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-15: gsang ba rdo rje grags pa cher //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-16: rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-18: sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-20: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-21: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-22: lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-23: khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-25: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-26: zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-27: thugs ni dgyes par gyur nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-28: chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:493b-29: chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-2: bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-3: dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-4: kun dga' ra bskyed mos tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-5: lha yi bu mo sogs pas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-6: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-7: bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-8: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-9: de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-10: rigs 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-11: mchod pa byas par nges mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-13: rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-14: rmi lam dri ma med mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-15: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las; ;skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-16: gdol pa khyi yi sbyor la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-17: gal te rdo rje blos mthong na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-18: blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-20: de la 'di ni rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-21: rang sems rnams ni dmigs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-22: chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-23: nam mkha' rdo rje'i gnas sems 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-24: chos med chos nyid med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494a-29: thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tshom gcod pa rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-0: chos @494b rnams ngo bo med pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-1: chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-2: ae ma'o ngo mtshar las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-3: nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-6: thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-8: nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-9: mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-10: nam mkha' de nga ni chos thams cad du gtogs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:494b-11: thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du yang mi sems so //
