K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-13: thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-14: bdag nyid gang tshe spyod pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-15: rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-17: yang na rdo rje mi 'chir grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-18: slob ma rdo rje 'od po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-19: sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-20: las kyi go 'phang bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-21: sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-22: rdo rje'i thig skud dag la dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-23: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-24: gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-25: rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-26: tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-27: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-28: gsang ba byang chub dam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-29: sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-30: rdo rje h'um ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-31: sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-32: gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499a-33: de ltar rtag tu byas na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-0: rdo rje mi @499b phyed gsum las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-2: 'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-3: rdo rje bum pa bzhag pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-4: sngags rgyud bdag pos shes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-6: brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-8: sngags shes pas ni sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-9: bshang cig 'bru mar sha la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-10: sbyin sreg tu ni dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-11: rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-12: rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-13: dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-14: bsams te gzhal du dbab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-16: dbang po gnyis kyi dam tshig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-17: sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-18: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-19: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-20: rnam snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-21: slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-22: a'a:ni lus dang ngag sems la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-23: bsgoms nas rdo rje gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-24: rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-25: grags chen rnam par snang mdzad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-26: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-27: bying yis brlabs ni rab tu gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-28: de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-30: 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:499b-33: de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-1: rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-2: yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-3: rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-4: sil snyan dri yi sprin rnams bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-6: rdo rje sku gsum sdags kyi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-7: yungs kar dag gis brdeg par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-8: de la de yi tshe na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-9: bdag nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-11: yang na sangs rgyas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-12: bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-13: bzung bar mkhas pa dag gis bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-14: rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-15: slob ma rtag tu blo brtan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-16: lus dang ngan sems rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-17: sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-18: de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang ba slob dpon thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-19: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-20: rdo rje gsang ba gsum bas byang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-21: khams gsum dag gis phyag byas ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-22: rdo rje dbang bskur chen po sbyin; ;de la 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba bya ba'i cho ga gsang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-23: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-24: mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-25: bdag kyang 'gra tu bsgral ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-26: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-27: de tshe de la dbang bskur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-28: rab tu dgyes nas stsol bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500a-29: lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-0: snying @500b gar bdag po gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-1: rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-2: sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-3: dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-5: dam tshig gsang pa bsgrag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-6: khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-7: brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-8: ma byin par yang khyod kyis long //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-9: bud med dag kyang bsten par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-10: rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-11: sems can thams cad bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-14: dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-15: sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-16: de la sngags kyang sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-17: sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-18: gsang ba sbyin pa brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-19: khu ba'am yang na bshang ba'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-20: chog bzhin du bsngags nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-21: rdo rje'i blos ni bza' bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-22: 'on tang dngos grub rnyed mi dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-23: rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-24: rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-25: sngags kyi 'khor lo bud med gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-26: sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-27: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang sngags kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-28: glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-29: sha chen dag kyang bza' bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-30: sngags rnams kun la dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-31: de ltar byas na mgon po mnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:500b-32: nyin re rdo rje slob ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-2: bshang gci sha yi bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-3: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-4: sngags rnams kun gyi yi ge aom//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-5: bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-6: bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rigs pa'i skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-7: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-8: dam tshig chen po bsgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-9: sangs rgyas byang chub nyid dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-10: nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-11: mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-12: rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-13: rdo rje sku yi bka' bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-15: bshang gci dang ni sha chen rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-16: cha ni mnyam par byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-17: kham phor sbyar mar bzhag na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-18: sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-20: de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag gzhug pa rab tu sgrub pa'i dam tshig gi mchog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-22: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-23: sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-24: yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-25: de yi sku gsung thug [?] gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-26: der ni sngags kyi dbab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501a-29: thugs kyi sngags rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i snying po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-0: a'a: kham dh'i: phyag na rdo rje'i @501b gzugs chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-2: gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-3: bsgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-4: de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas so; ;nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-5: mi bskyod pa ni rab tu brtag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-6: tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-7: rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-8: 'od chen sdug bsngal chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-9: thams cad snying pos bskul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-10: de la 'di ni rdo rje'i snying po thams cad bskul ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-12: a'a:/ mdung rtse che dang rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-13: lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-14: rdo rje cho ga bzhin bskul na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-15: sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu' grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-17: nyams dga' ba yi dvags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-18: chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-19: zla ba phyed ni tshon chad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-20: sangs rgyas thob pa gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-21: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-22: rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-23: de yi 'khor tshogs lhan cig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-25: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-27: zab mo'i chos kyang thos 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-29: bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje bzhad pas de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-30: de la 'di ni mngag gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:501b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-2: rdo rje sku yi dgod pa ches //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-3: mngag gzhug pa dag rtag tu bskul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-4: de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi dam tshig gi gnas so; ;dam tshig bskul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-8: mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-9: chos rnams thams cad rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-10: gong bu'i tshul gyis byed pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-11: rdo rje rmad byung gzugs can no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-12: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-13: sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-14: gal te dbang du bya 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-15: rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-16: gsang ba chen po 'di bsam mo; ;rdo rje 'jam pa stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-17: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-18: mda' lnga'i sbyor ba dag gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-19: dbu rgyan rtse mo yang dag spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-20: gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-21: rdo rje khro bos rab tu dbab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-22: sdangs shing brgyal bar bsgom pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-23: byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-24: bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-25: gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gis bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-26: sngags rnams kun gyis rab gsang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-27: rdo rje'i don gyis blo yis gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502a-28: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-0: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus @502b bsam pa; ;sngags kyi rdo rje h'um la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-1: rdo rje gsum la sogs par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-2: aom ni mig gi dbus bsams nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-3: 'di dag cho ga bzhin du bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-4: sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-5: sku gsung rdo rje can du mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-6: bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-7: sbyor ba 'di ni rnam bsam na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-8: rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-9: sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-10: rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-11: pas ma na don rnams thams cad 'byor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-12: bam ni kha yi nang du bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-13: aom ni lce la 'dug par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-14: bza' phar bya ba kun gyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-15: yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-16: zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-17: ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-18: bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-20: rdo rje bsgom pa'i tshig gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-22: b'i; sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-23: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-24: rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:502b-25: bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:520b-14: thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:520b-16: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:520b-17: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:520b-18: rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:520b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di gzung zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:520b-21: khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:520b-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:520b-23: zhes gsol nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:520b-24: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-7: de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-10: thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-12: sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-15: thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-16: rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra wa rma [?] dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521a-17: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521b-0: rgya gar gyi @521b mkhan po shr'i dzny'a na ka ra bas bshad nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521b-1: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis zhus gtugs g-yar khral du 'tshal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521b-2: 'dus ba'i rtsa rgyud la lo chen gyis bsgyur ba mang du snang na'ang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521b-3: 'gos kyis 'gyur bcos mdzad pa nyung bar snang la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-082-018:521b-4: 'grel pa'i bshad pa 'gos 'gyur gyi steng nas byed pa la rgyud kyi 'gos 'gyur gal che bar mthong nas bris pa'o //
